Do I need to enter any Disqus code on this website? Let's find out!

```{r,tidy=TRUE,echo=FALSE,cache=TRUE,warning=FALSE}
library(plyr)
xfun <- function() {
  x <- runif(2,0,1)
  mean(x)
}
res1 <- raply(100,xfun())
hist(res1,breaks = 50,col = "aliceblue")
```

And down here is hopefully Disqus.
